tool.name: Pairable small RNAs

param.name: index
param.label: Select the reference genome used for the bowtie output
param.help: if your genome of interest is not listed - contact Christophe Antoniewski at drosofff@gmail.com

param.name: input
param.label: Compute signature from this alignment file

param.name: minquery
param.label: Min size of query small RNAs

param.name: maxquery
param.label: Max size of query small RNAs

param.name: mintarget
param.label: Min size of target small RNAs

param.name: maxtarget
param.label: Max size of target small RNAs

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool outputs pairable reads with 10nt overlap from a bowtie output file. The output file is in a bowtie format. The numerical options set the min and max size of both the query small rna class and the target small rna class
-----
**Warning**
.. class:: warningmark
**Tool under development**
